backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access‑controlled user profiles and CRUD operations for financial entries with summaries and category breakdowns.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files and components.
frontend/ANDROID_APK.md: Guide explaining prerequisites and steps to build the Android debug APK using Capacitor and Android Studio.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android build artifacts, IDE files, and generated folders.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Gradle configuration for the Android app including SDK versions, dependencies, and Capacitor integration.
frontend/android/app/capacitor.build.gra: Auto‑generated Capacitor Gradle config setting Java 17 compatibility and plugin variables.
frontend/android/app/proguard-rules.pro: ProGuard keep rules for Capacitor, WebView JS interfaces, and app classes.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android manifest defining app metadata, main activity, file provider, and required permissions.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/e: Main Capacitor activity initializing the WebView with custom configuration.
Utility enabling JavaScript, storage, mixed content, caching, zoom, and custom user agent in WebView.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/drawab: Splash screen layout displaying a white background and centered launcher icon.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Round adaptive launcher icon referencing background and foreground layers.
Adaptive launcher icon referencing background and foreground layers.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Theme color definitions for primary, dark primary, and accent colors.
Color resource defining the launcher icon background color.
App string resources including app name and package identifiers.
Android theme styles including main app theme and splash‑based launch theme.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/xml/fi: File provider paths enabling cache and external directory access.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle config defining repositories, buildscript dependencies, and a clean task.
frontend/android/capacitor-cordova-andro: Ignores the build directory for generated Cordova Capacitor plugins.
Build configuration for the Capacitor Cordova Android plugins library module with SDK versions and dependencies.
Auto-generated Gradle variables file defining SDK levels and library versions for Cordova plugins.
frontend/android/capacitor.settings.grad: Auto-generated settings file including the Capacitor Android module from node_modules.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Project-wide Gradle settings including JVM args, AndroidX flags, and build architecture options.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Configures the Gradle wrapper to use Gradle 8.0.
frontend/android/gradlew: Unix shell script for invoking the Gradle wrapper.
frontend/android/gradlew.bat: Windows batch script for invoking the Gradle wrapper.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Includes the app and Cordova plugin modules and applies Capacitor settings.
frontend/android/variables.gradle: Defines Android SDK versions and library version variables used across the Gradle build.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor config defining app metadata, web directory, and Android-specific settings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with extensive theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/android/build-debug-apk: Build script automating React build, Capacitor sync, and Android debug APK creation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup, navigation, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Auth wrapper that shows a login screen until Internet Identity authentication succeeds.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Period: Date-range selector with quick actions for current month and clearing filters, using popover calendars for start and end dates.
frontend/src/components/entries/DeleteEn: Confirmation dialog to delete an entry, showing entry details and triggering a delete mutation.
frontend/src/components/entries/EditEntr: Dialog for editing an existing entry with fields for date, type, amount, category, and note, then submitting an update mutation.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesE: Displays an empty-state card encouraging the user to add their first entry.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesM: Mobile-friendly list rendering entries with badges, amounts, notes, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesT: Main entries view with filters, date range selection, table/mobile layouts, and edit/delete dialogs.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntryFor: Form for creating new expense or saving entries with date, type, amount, category, and note inputs.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Application header with logo, user greeting, login button, and navigation between main pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component with header, animated background, content wrapper, and footer including a caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting the user for their name and saving the profile via mutation with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/constants/categories.ts: Defines fixed expense and saving category arrays and related TypeScript types.
React Query hook that fetches dashboard data from the backend actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useEntries.ts: Hooks for fetching entries and performing add/update/delete mutations while invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUserProfil: Hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile, role, and admin status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, status tracking, and persisted identity handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with light/dark theme variables, background image, and animated overlay effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry mounting React with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page computing filtered financial stats from entries and dashboard data with period selection.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadApkPage.tsx: Page showing a debug Android APK download with system requirements, installation steps, and a download button.
frontend/src/pages/EntriesPage.tsx: Page displaying a header, an entry creation form, and a table of existing entries.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Provides a function to format numbers as INR currency using en-IN locale rules.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with custom theme tokens.
project_state.json: Project state file describing app goals, design notes, known issues, and implemented features.
